column2:
"I thought if I could talk to 'em, it would be worth a
shot, you know? Maybe they know something
about my missing person."
"But I guess we'll have to get rid of the Darkers first."

"What do you say, partner? Let's go hunt us some
Kartagots over in Volcanic Caverns!"

"Who knows how it'll turn out if I go alone, but with
you by my side, it'll be a piece of cake!"

"*This client order with Afin will be easier to complete
if you set a password in the \"Enter Party Info\" menu and
select the \"Limit multiplayer requests from other parties\" option
when accepting it."
